mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zixunshi_id as zixunshiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.zixunshi_collection_types as zixunshiCollectionTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,zixunshi.zixunshi_name as zixunshiName ,zixunshi.zixunshi_phone as zixunshiPhone ,zixunshi.zixunshi_id_number as zixunshiIdNumber ,zixunshi.zixunshi_email as zixunshiEmail ,zixunshi.zixunshi_photo as zixunshiPhoto ,zixunshi.zixunshi_congye as zixunshiCongye ,zixunshi.zixunshi_shanchang as zixunshiShanchang ,zixunshi.zixunshi_content as zixunshiContent
FROM zixunshi_collection a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN zixunshi zixunshi ON a.zixunshi_id = zixunshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.zixunshi_id = #{params.zixunshiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.zixunshi_collection_types = #{params.zixunshiCollectionTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and a.zixunshi_id IS NOT NULL
and zixunshi.zixunshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiName},'%')
and zixunshi.zixunshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiPhone},'%')
and zixunshi.zixunshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiIdNumber},'%')
and zixunshi.zixunshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiEmail},'%')
and zixunshi.zixunshi_congye like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiCongye},'%')
and zixunshi.zixunshi_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiShanchang},'%')
and zixunshi.zixunshi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
